item.title: Make static-site with HUGO and Docsy theme
item.description: Overview This time we will use docsy example site to make our own HUGO static-site. Then we will deploy our site to Github with Github Pages. Let’s start with Generating the static site. Generate static-site Installing HUGO Conclusion
